TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ThenBy extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供方法在套用 運算式之後，將排序運算式套用至 資料來源物件。

span.span: Provides a way to apply a sort expression to an data source object after an expression is applied.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 排序後的作業透過執行中的運算式控制項，後續的排序作業可以由使用上不同的資料欄位的類別。After a sort operation is performed by using the expression in the control, subsequent sort operations can be performed by using the class on a different data field. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何依 [ListPrice] 欄位，以遞減順序排序資料，然後在 ProductID 欄位以遞增順序使用型別。The following example shows how to sort data by the ListPrice field in descending order and then on the ProductID field in ascending order using the type. 此程式碼範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分[逐步解說： 在網頁上使用宣告式語法中的 篩選資料](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b305ae31-1a1b-4d07-a678-51457c17614f)。This code example is part of a larger example provided in [Walkthrough: Filtering Data in a Web Page Using Declarative Syntax](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b305ae31-1a1b-4d07-a678-51457c17614f). ``` ```

related.span: QueryExtender Web 伺服器控制項概觀

summary.span: 取得或設定要套用 運算式之 物件的屬性。

span.span: Gets or sets the property of the object to apply the expression to.

value.span: 要套用 運算式之 物件的屬性。

span.span: The property of the object to apply the expression to.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 排序上指定的資料欄位的資料。The sorts the data on a specified data field. 後續的排序作業可以由不同的資料欄位上使用集合。Subsequent sort operations can be performed on a different data field by using the the collection. 這個屬性會指定要套用的資料欄位`ThenBy`排序作業。This property specifies the data field to apply the `ThenBy` sort operation to. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何依 [ListPrice] 欄位以遞減順序，然後在 [產品識別碼] 欄位，以遞增順序排序資料。The following example shows how to sort data by the ListPrice field in descending order and then on the Product ID field in ascending order. 此程式碼範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分[逐步解說： 在網頁上使用宣告式語法中的 篩選資料](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b305ae31-1a1b-4d07-a678-51457c17614f)。This code example is part of a larger example provided in [Walkthrough: Filtering Data in a Web Page Using Declarative Syntax](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b305ae31-1a1b-4d07-a678-51457c17614f). ``` ```

summary.span: 取得或設定 資料來源物件的排序方向。

span.span: Gets or sets the ordering direction of the data source object.

value.span: 資料來源物件的排序方向。

span.span: The ordering direction of the data source object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用於以遞增或遞減順序排序資料的控制項。The is used in the control to sort data in ascending or descending order. 使用指定的排序作業方向屬性。The direction of the sort operation is specified by using the property. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何排序資料 [ListPrice] 欄位以遞減的順序和使用依遞增順序排列的 ProductID 欄位屬性。The following example shows how to sort data by the ListPrice field in descending order and on the ProductID field in ascending order by using the property. 此程式碼範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分[逐步解說： 在網頁上使用宣告式語法中的 篩選資料](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b305ae31-1a1b-4d07-a678-51457c17614f)。This code example is part of a larger example provided in [Walkthrough: Filtering Data in a Web Page Using Declarative Syntax](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b305ae31-1a1b-4d07-a678-51457c17614f). ``` ```
